mapper.insert: insert into BroadcastTaskTemplete (TempleteID, TaskName, Method, State, Text, BroadcastFileIDs, BroadcastEndpoints, play_mode, play_volume, play_second, Remark) values (#{templeteID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{text,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{broadcastFileIDs,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{broadcastEndpoints,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{play_mode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{play_volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{play_second,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
